text: The church has maintained the customary decor and when I visited the church for the first time I felt like attending the service in Kerala, also the members were very highly disciplined and warm
Thank you for hosting us TTC students! What an incredible experience, it felt like we were transported back in time, experiencing the liturgy of the early church.
Parish Church of the Orthodox Syrian Christian Community in Singapore. Regular Sunday morning services. Booking applicable as per prevailing Covid19 regulations.
Blessed moments, you come to this church and you will feel ..🙏🙏🙏
